title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 2) Order, 2024
content:
12th January, 2024 Statutory Instruments 41
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 6 of 2024
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 2) Order, 2024
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 2)
Order, 2024.
2. A candidate for election as a Councillor in a district and Date and
Time of
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the
nomination
Returning Officer on Thursday, 18th, January, 2024 between 09:00 for election
hours and 15:00 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Friday, 19th Campaign
Period
January, 2024 at 14:00 hours and close at 18:00 hours on
Wednesday, 14th February, 2024.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a Councilor in a district and Election
date and
ward set out in the schedule shall take place on Thursday, 15th time of poll
February, 2024 between 06:00 hours and 18:00 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district or ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
